mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (select ROWNUM R, NT.* FROM (select * from notice order by num desc) NT) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{lastRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE(NUM, TITLE, CONTENTS, WRITER) VALUES(NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{contents}, #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET TITLE =#{title}, CONTENTS=#{contents}, WRITER=#{writer}, REGDATE=sysdate WHERE NUM=#{num}
